description: The collective growth of these rooftop venues are a boost to Singapore’s nightlife scene. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Raising the roof: Vibes and views at rooftop venues elevate the dining experience
title_page: Raising the roof: Vibes and views at rooftop venues elevate the dining experience | The Straits Times
maintext:
SINGAPORE – Cocktails, ceviches, sushi and tacos with panoramic views? Dining with a view hits new heights at a slew of swanky rooftop venues.
These include the likes of Sushisamba Singapore at Capital Tower and OUE Sky’s nightlife destination HighHouse and the soon-to-open Nova rooftop bar at One Raffles Place.
